quote_first:
On Saturday. November 12. 1955, the Hill Valley Courthouses clock tower was struck by lightning,
which poured 1.21 gigawatts of energy into the structure.  Time stood still at
quote_last: on the clocks face from that day on,
title: Back to the Future: Race through Time
author: Marc Sumerak

title: Rabbit, Run
author: John Updike
